drafts.subject: Security alert
drafts.thread_summary: Google sent a security alert regarding Email Assistant's access to a Google Account, prompting a review of account activity to ensure security. The account in question is n00503033@gmail.com, and the owner is advised to check their account and make changes as needed through their Google Account settings or by visiting https://myaccount.google.com/notifications.
drafts.generated_reply:
Dear Google Team,

We appreciate your notification regarding the security alert for the account n00503033@gmail.com. We will review the account activity to ensure its security and make any necessary changes through the Google Account settings or by visiting https://myaccount.google.com/notifications. We will take immediate action to secure the account and verify the access granted to Email Assistant. We will monitor the account's activity closely to prevent any potential security breaches.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
Executive Email Assistant
drafts.prompt: You are an executive email assistant for a busy lab director. Given the summary of the email thread and the metadata provided, draft a concise, polite reply that acknowledges the sender, addresses the key request, and clearly states next steps. Keep the reply under 5 sentences and maintain a professional, helpful tone.
